TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s t k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z v ɪ ŋ z w ɪ v h ɜː f l ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v v l ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː s f aɪ f ɪ k s n æ p ʌ v b ɹ uː tʃ iː s æ n d m eɪ b iː h ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ɑː ð ɚ b ɔː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː t ɐ s m ɔːɹ p l æ s t ɪ k s n ɛ k n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ tʃ ɔːɹ f l ɔ k f ɜː ð ə k ɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z v ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ f ɹ iː ɹ ɛ t b æ k s æ n w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t t ə tʃ eɪ ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
